noAward.littleText:
The length of your comment suggests that you haven't properly explained why /u/PARENTUSERNAME's comment was helpful (comment rule 4).

Lam-Bot is able to rescan edited comments. Please edit your comment with the required explanation and **make sure the * is shown** so that Lam-Bot can see it.
noAward.op:
You can't award OP a lambda.

If you were explaining when/how to award a lambda, please use a reddit quote for the symbol next time.
noAward.db3: You can't award Lam-Bot a lambda, but ze appreciates the effort :D
noAward.self: You can't award yourself a lambda.

en-us.hiddenParamsComment: This is hidden text for LB1 to parse. Please contact the author of LB1 if you see this
en-us.firstDeltaMessage:
Congratulations - you've earned your first lambda!

As you may already know, a lambda (λ) is given when a comment has been especially helpful.

I have updated your user flair and created [your own wiki page](https://reddit.com/r/<%= subreddit %>/wiki/user/<%= username %>) which will be updated every time you earn a lambda. The lambda is a symbol for gay and lesbian rights, denoted for it's meaning in chemistry and physics. In sharing your information and experiences, you have participated in an exchange of energy with the goal of making the world a little bit better.

Thank you!

---

[*^(I am a bot)*](https://github.com/MystK/delta-bot-three)*^(, and this action was performed automatically. )*[*^(Please contact the moderators)*](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/<%= subreddit %>)*^( if you have any further questions or concerns.)*
en-us.deltaLogContent:
Below is a list of the lambdas awarded in [this post](<%= linkToPost %>).

Please note that a change of view [is not necessarily a reversal](https://www.reddit.com/r/lambda/wiki/index#wiki_what_is_a_.27view.27.3F), and that OP awarding a lambda doesn't mean the conversation has ended.

For a full explanation of the lambda system, [see here](https://www.reddit.com/r/askGSM/wiki/deltasystem).

-----

# Lambdas from OP /u/<%= opUsername %>

[](HTTP://DB3-FROMOP)

#Deltas from Other Users

[](HTTP://DB3-FROMOTHER)
en-us.deltaLogSticky:
/u/<%= username %> (OP) has awarded at least one lambda in this post.

All comments that earned lambdas (from OP or other users) are listed [**here**](<%= linkToPost %>), in /r/<%= deltaLogSubreddit %>.

Please note that a doesn't mean that the conversation has ended.

^[Delta System Explained](https://www.reddit.com/r/askGSM/wiki/deltasystem) ^| ^[Deltaboards](https://www.reddit.com/r/askgsm/wiki/deltaboards)
en-us.deltaLogOPEntry: * 1 lambda from OP to /u/<%= awardedUsername %> for "[<%= awardedText %>](<%= awardedLink %>)"
en-us.deltaLogOtherEntry: * 1 lambda from /u/<%= awardingUsername %> to /u/<%= awardedUsername %> for "[<%= awardedText %>](<%= awardedLink %>)"
